name: Elevator Operator (Hugh Romand)
description:
Play an elevator operator when the control system of the elevator shuts down somehow. You will have to manually decide which floor which elevator is moving to.

- Set the number of floors and elevators you would like to play with at the beginning

- Click and Drag the number buttons at the left-top to the bottom panels to assign tasks to each elevator

- Number above each little yellow person's head indicates their targeted floor to move to; help them to get to their destination
